inclusion.criterion: Subject is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject (or legal guardian) understands the trial requirements and the treatment procedures and provides written informed consent before any trial-specific tests or procedures are performed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has moderate to severe (3+) or severe (4+) functional mitral regurgitation confirmed by echocardiography core lab
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject is symptomatic (NYHA Class II-IV) despite guideline directed medical therapy, including CRT if indicated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The local site heart team concurs that mitral valve surgery will not be offered as a first-line treatment option
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject is a candidate for annuloplasty based on the criteria below as assessed by the investigative site (and confirmed by the Case Review Committee [CRC]): Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction (LVEF) ≥ 25% Left Ventricular End Diastolic Diameter (LVEDD) ≤ 65 mm Coaptation distance (i.e. tenting height) < 10 mm Absence of posterior wall aneurysm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Left Ventricular End Diastolic Diameter (LVEDD) ≤ 65 mm
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has severe calcification of the mitral annulus or leaflets or other anatomic features that make the subject unsuitable for annuloplasty with the Millipede System in the judgment of the treating physician
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Transfemoral venous and transseptal access determined not to be feasible
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome, severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, and is symptomatic. She remains prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
